remarks.format: ## Remarks 分页允许您在页面段中显示 控件的内容。Paging allows you to display the contents of the control in page segments. 页面上的项数由 属性确定。The number of items on a page is determined by the property. 如果没有为 属性指定任何值，则 将在页面上显示10个项。If no value is specified for the property, the will display 10 items on a page. 通常，每次 控件移动到不同页时，都将加载包含 控件中每一行的数据源。Normally, a data source that contains every row in the control is loaded every time the control moves to a different page. 当数据源非常大时，这可能会占用大量资源。This can consume a lot of resources when the data source is very large. 自定义分页允许只加载显示单个页面所需的数据段。Custom paging allows you to load just the segment of data needed to display a single page. 要启用自定义分页，请将 "" 和 "" 属性都设置为 "`true`"。To enable custom paging, set both the and properties to `true`. 接下来，提供处理 事件的代码。Next, provide code to handle the event. 事件处理程序的典型逻辑是首先将 属性设置为要显示的页的索引。The typical logic for the event handler is to first set the property to the index of the page you want to display. > [!NOTE] > 事件处理程序接收作为参数的 对象。The event handler receives a object as a parameter. 您可以使用此参数的 属性来确定用户从 控件的页选择元素中选择的页的索引。You can use the property of this parameter to determine the index of the page selected by the user from the page selection elements of the control. 接下来，创建一个数据源，其中包含要在单个页面上显示的数据，然后使用 方法将数据绑定到 控件。Next, create a data source that contains the data to display on a single page and then use the method to bind the data to the control. > [!NOTE] > 由于只加载一段数据，因此必须将 属性设置为 控件中的总项数。Because only a segment of the data is loaded, you must set the property to the total number of items in the control. 这允许控件确定显示 控件中的每一项所需的总页数。This allows the control to determine the total number of pages needed to display every item in the control. 确定 控件中的总项数后，通常以编程方式设置此属性。This property is normally programmatically set once the total number of items in the control is determined. 当通过将 属性设置为 `false`启用分页时， 控件假设数据源包含所有要显示的项。When paging is enabled with the property is set to `false`, the control assumes that the data source contains all the items to be displayed. 控件基于页索引（由 属性指定），计算所显示页上项的索引，以及由 属性指定的页上的项数。The control calculates the indexes of the items on the displayed page based on the page index, specified by the property, and the number of items on a page, specified by the property. 属性设置为 `true`时， 控件假设数据源仅包含由 属性确定的项。When the property is set to `true`, the control assumes that the data source only contains the items as determined by the property. 将显示所有项，直至 属性指定的项数。All items up to the number of items specified by the property are displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性启用自定义分页。The following code example
